scripts.all: npm i && npm run get-all-submodules && npm run cleanup && npm run compile-posdao-contracts && npm run make-poa-spec && npm run start-poa && npm run transit-to-posdao && npm run test-posdao && npm run stop-test-setup
scripts.cleanup: bash scripts/stop-test-setup && rm -rf ./build ./parity-data ./accounts && git checkout ./parity-data && git checkout ./accounts
scripts.compile-posdao-contracts: cd ./posdao-contracts && npm i && npm run compile
